Table 23  Kidney transplant* wait-list at December 31 and wait-list deaths, Canada (excluding Quebec), 2012 to 2021 (number)
* Includes both adult and pediatric patients.
† On hold statistics from Manitoba are missing for 2018.
Active: Patients who can receive a transplant at any time.
On hold: Patients who cannot receive a transplant for a medical or other reason for a short period of time.
Deaths on wait-list: Patients who died while waiting for a transplant (includes patients who were active or on hold on the wait-list at time of death).
Data from Quebec was excluded from this table because of significant under-reporting of transplant data between 2012 and 2021.
Canadian Organ Replacement Register, 2022, Canadian Institute for Health Information.
